    <field name="format_ii">0</field>

    <field name="repository_ssm">tamwag</field>
    <field name="scopecontent_teim">The collection consists of an unpublished memoir, "The Last Good Fight," written by Hank Rubin, a veteran of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade.  The memoir documents his life shortly before, during and after the Spanish Civil War.</field>

    <field name="unitdate_start_sim">1937</field>
    <field name="unitdate_start_ssm">1937</field>
    <field name="unitid_ssm">ALBA.275</field>
